SalesTrxnItemRelationship.name: SalesTrxnItemRelationship
SalesTrxnItemRelationship.description: Describes the relationship between sales transaction items; for example, a bundle or set.

AssociatedItemPricing.description: Describes how the associated sales transaction item is priced, relative to the main sales transaction item.

AssociatedSalesTrxnItemId.description: The unique identifier of the associated sales transaction item.

AssociatedSalesTrxnItemRole.description: Describes the position of the associated sales transaction item in the relationship.

ImplementorType.description: The object that is implementing this object interface; for example, an OrderProduct object.

MainSalesTrxnItemId.description: The unique identifier of the main sales transaction item.

MainSalesTrxnItemRole.description: Indicates the position of the main sales transaction item in the relationship.

ProductRelationshipTypeId.description: The unique identifier of the record that describes the relationship between the main and associated sales transaction items.

QuantityScaleMethod.description: How to scale the quantity of the associated sales transaction item, relative to the main sales transaction item. The value is informative; the system doesn’t check whether the scaled quantities are correct. If this field has a non-null value, you can't edit the associated sales transaction item’s quantity.

SalesTransactionId.description: The unique identifier of the sales transaction to which the main and associated sales transaction items belong to.
